bug.author: motikadosh
bug.summary: Using matplotlib figure show() method instead of plt.show()
bug.description: Hi, I would like to upload plots to my experiment. I am not using plt.show() as the sample demonstrates. I am using figure object with fig.show(), is it possible to have this figure uploaded to the experiment? Thanks

comments.comment: Thank you, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/motikadosh>@motikadosh</denchmark-link> , I think you are correct. This seems like a bug. Let me verify and get back to you.
Try this RC, it should fix the problem :) $ pip install trains==0.10.3rc3

Thanks a lot!! I will try it in a short time.
Moti <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
